text: Zevender is a village in the Dutch province of Utrecht. It is located in the municipality of Lopik, 2 km northeast of Schoonhoven. Zevender was a separate municipality from 1817 to 1857, when it was merged with Willige Langerak.Ad van der Meer and Onno Boonstra, "Repertorium van Nederlandse gemeenten", KNAW, 2006. ==References== Category:Populated places in Utrecht (province) Category:Former municipalities of Utrecht (province) Category:1817 establishments in the Netherlands Category:Lopik
title: Zevender
